ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, "System Admin")), OR($Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations",$Profile.Name = "2008-09 HRS 4S Operations B",$Profile.Name ="2008-09 HRS 4S Service Manager"),
RecordType.Name = "HRS 4S Manual Trade" ,
NOT(ISBLANK(Distribution_Entered__c)), ISBLANK(Funds_Available_for_Distribution__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Funds Available for Distribution to continue.
